courtana
========

Tools to analyse *Drosophila* courtship behavior.

Usage
-----

.. todo: Show very simple examples of Experiment, Annotations and TrackData

Installation
------------

Available on PyPI:

    pip install courtana


Requirements
^^^^^^^^^^^^

* numpy
* scipy
* pandas
* numexpr
* tables
